main

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing main function. Instantiates two threads:
    - GUI thread, a thread for the graphical window.
    - a thread for requesting read commands periodically.
    Author:
    Gustavo CIOTTO PINTON, Bruno MARTINS
